p: Among the fruits and vegetables with the highest production are tomato ( Solanum lycopersicum), apple ( Malus domestica), onion ( Allium cepa), orange ( Citrus Ã— sinensis), Cole ( Brassica oleracea var. Capitata), gherkin ( Cucumis sativus L.), eggplant ( Solanum melongena), mango ( Mangifera indica), carrot ( Daucus carota), guava ( Psidium guajava L.), and pepper ( Capsicum anuum), which are processed for the production of value-added foods in the food industry ( Figure 4) [ 80].
